attributes.action: make St. Georges day a public holiday
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: why is St. Georges day not a public holiday and england the irish and scotish have a public holday for there saints day so why not england i have set up the petition to try and hopefully make it a public holiday

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
